org.openimaj.image.typography

Class FontStyle<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openimaj.image.typography.FontStyle<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the pixel type
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    GeneralFontStyle, HersheyFontStyle, MathMLFontStyle

    public class FontStyle<T>
extends Object
    Base class for the representation of font styles.
    Author:
    Jonathon Hare (jsh2@ecs.soton.ac.uk)

    • Field Detail

      • FONT

        public static final AttributedCharacterIterator.Attribute FONT
        Attribute for the font. Value should be a Font.

      • ITALIC

        public static final AttributedCharacterIterator.Attribute ITALIC
        Attribute for italic text. Value should be Boolean.

      • ANGLE

        public static final AttributedCharacterIterator.Attribute ANGLE
        Attribute for rotating the text. Value should be a Number in radians.

      • COLOUR

        public static final AttributedCharacterIterator.Attribute COLOUR
        Attribute for stroke colour. Value should be of type .

      • HORIZONTAL_ALIGNMENT

        public static final AttributedCharacterIterator.Attribute HORIZONTAL_ALIGNMENT
        Attribute for horizontal alignment. Must be an instance of FontStyle.HorizontalAlignment

      • VERTICAL_ALIGNMENT

        public static final AttributedCharacterIterator.Attribute VERTICAL_ALIGNMENT
        Attribute for vertical alignment. Must be an instance of FontStyle.VerticalAlignment

      • FONT_SIZE

        public static final AttributedCharacterIterator.Attribute FONT_SIZE
        Attribute for font size. Must be a Number in pixels.

      • parseAttributes

        public void parseAttributes(Map<? extends AttributedCharacterIterator.Attribute,Object> attrs)
        Parse the attributes map and set this FontStyle accordingly. Subclasses should override this method to add extra attributes.
        Parameters:
        attrs - the attribute map
